title: A Pioneering Black Ballerina’s Life Story Comes to the Stage
description: Lauren Anderson, whose story is told in “Plumshuga” in Houston, talks about the show, her personal battles and storied career: “I got to the mountaintop.”
dc:creator: Kayla Stewart
media:credit: Annie Mulligan for The New York Times
media:description: Lauren Anderson hugs Danae McGlothen, the dancer who plays a young Lauren in “Plumshuga,” on opening night in Houston.
